name: GetBatchStatus
description:
Retrieve the status of a Mailchimp batch request.

Use this tool to check the current status of a specific batch request in Mailchimp, identified by its batch ID.

parameters.name: batch_operation_id
parameters.description: The unique ID for the Mailchimp batch operation to check its status.

value_schema.description: The unique id for the batch operation.

parameters.name: return_fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to include in the response, using dot notation for sub-objects.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: excluded_fields_list
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to exclude from the response. Use dot notation for sub-object parameters.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.
